name: de.jochenheckl.unity.databinding
description:
This library brings data binding to Unity. Aiming to minimize the effort required to create dynamic, performant user interfaces.

DataBinding Supports both classic Unity UI and the new UIToolkit.



DataBinding is easy to use and comes with some simple examples to get started.

samples.description: A collection of simple scenes that demonstrate certain aspects of the data binding package.
A simple example demonstrating the use of DataBinding when using the new UIToolkit.
